ModMetaData.name: Categorized Bill Menus
ModMetaData.author: kathanon
ModMetaData.description:
Splits the "Add bill" menu into sub-menus by the categories of the products.
Also adds a "Favorites" sub-menu (if any favorited recipes are available). Use the star icon to favorite a recipe. Styled items connected to an ideoligion use the same recipe, and are not favorited separately. They will appear in the favorites menu if the base recipe is favorited.
What categories to make sub-menus for is configurable. Any category that would result in a sub-menu containing only one item is automatically excluded.
Safe to add or remove at any point.
